title: Exclusive Offer
contents:
Whether visiting New York for business or leisure, make WestHouse your house away from home, and enjoy our convenient location right in the heart of Midtown.

Book directly with us and save 25% off your next trip to NYC.

https://westhousehotelnewyork.reztrip.com/ext/promoRate?property=354&mode=b&pm=true&sr=159510&vr=3
